articles.title: If you’re not an AI startup, good luck raising money from VCs

articles.title: With its latest acqui-hire, OpenAI is doubling down on personalized consumer AI
articles.summary: OpenAI is acquiring the CEO of Roi, an AI financial companion.  Roi will sunset its service as its talent heads to OpenAI, ostensibly to help boost revenue in consumer apps.
